creator: Card Games, Inc
descriptionHtml:
🪝🦈Solitaire Fishing is a CREATIVE Klondike Solitaire card games with fishing gameplay. This is a great Klondike Solitaire game shouldn't be missed if you love playing Solitaire games. It's a great way to relax and train your brain with our challenging solitaire games. Enjoy your time and become the Fishing Master! Play our solitaire card games, go fishing for different ocean fish, and build your UNIQUE aquarium!

Solitaire Fishing combines fishing games with classic solitaire games. Bring the double fun of playing card games and fishing to you! You can collect dozens of ocean fish (🐠Clownfish, 🐡Pufferfish, 🐟Regal Tang, 🦈Mummy shark, Small yellow capsule, Pirate captain, Ocean sunfish, Candy Basslet, Clown triggerfish, Blue stripe clownfish, Royal-gramma, Flame Angelfish) by the fishing in the game.

Come and Try playing Solitaire Fishing, a FREE solitaire card game with undersea theme.

SOLITAIRE FISHING GAMES FEATURES:

Classic Solitaire Games Free
♠ Beautiful graphics
♠ Customizable card and table design
♠ Klondike Solitaire Draw 1 card
♠ Klondike Solitaire Draw 3 cards
♠ Unlimited free undos
♠ Unlimited free hints
♠ Intelligent hints
♠ Standard Klondike Solitaire scoring
♠ Auto complete
♠ Detailed solitaire card statistics
♠ The magic wand helps you solved game easily
♠ Left-Handed Mode
♠ Play Offline Free
♠ Sound that can be turned on/off
♠ Star Chest with lots of prizes
♠ Tablet support

Fishing in Solitaire Games
Based on the classic solitaire (also known as Patience or Klondike), we've added a AMAZING aquarium world with CREATIVE fishing gameplay! Play solitaire, go fishing and build your dream aquariums!
🪝Fishing Games - Win solitaire deals, get coins and go fishing for various beautiful fishes!
🪝Fish Collections - Complete Fish Collections by fishing and Get big rewards!
🪝Dream Aquariums - Unlock AMAZING aquariums by playing solitaire games.

If you like playing card games like solitaire, spider solitaire, freecell, spades, tripeaks solitaire, or like fishing, it is definitely the BEST classic solitaire games for you! You can play it anywhere and anytime! Download and play out Solitaire Fishing NOW!

Solitaire Fishing is currently the popular solitaire with undersea theme in the world. And if you also like cute fishes, don't hesitate to try this classic solitaire game!

💡We look forward to your feedback! Please contact us at NightingaleTech@outlook.com if you have any feedback on Solitaire Fishing!

😜Welcome to our solitaire card game world and become fishing master in 2023!
